TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit MediaFormat extends Java.Lang.Object

Docs.summary: Encapsulates the information describing the format of media data, be it audio or video.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance bool ContainsKey(string name) cil managed

Docs.summary: Returns true iff a key of the given name exists in the format.

MemberSignature.Value: public static Android.Media.MediaFormat CreateAudioFormat (string mime, int sampleRate, int channelCount);
.method public static hidebysig class Android.Media.MediaFormat CreateAudioFormat(string mime, int32 sampleRate, int32 channelCount) cil managed
static member CreateAudioFormat : string * int * int -> Android.Media.MediaFormat

Docs.param: The mime type of the content.
The sampling rate of the content.
The number of audio channels in the content.
Docs.summary: Creates a minimal audio format.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: public static Android.Media.MediaFormat CreateSubtitleFormat (string mime, string language);
.method public static hidebysig class Android.Media.MediaFormat CreateSubtitleFormat(string mime, string language) cil managed
static member CreateSubtitleFormat : string * string -> Android.Media.MediaFormat

Docs.param: The mime type of the content.

The language of the content, using either ISO 639-1 or 639-2/T codes. Specify null or "und" if language information is only included in the content. (This will also work if there are multiple language tracks in the content.)
Docs.summary: Creates a minimal subtitle format.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: public static Android.Media.MediaFormat CreateVideoFormat (string mime, int width, int height);
.method public static hidebysig class Android.Media.MediaFormat CreateVideoFormat(string mime, int32 width, int32 height) cil managed
static member CreateVideoFormat : string * int * int -> Android.Media.MediaFormat

Docs.param: The mime type of the content.
The width of the content (in pixels)
The height of the content (in pixels)
Docs.summary: Creates a minimal video format.

Docs.summary: A key describing the attenuation factor allowing to adapt the dynamics of the output to the actual listening requirements.

Docs.summary: A key describing the boost factor allowing to adapt the dynamics of the output to the actual listening requirements.
